content:
Sure, here's an example answer to the question, "tell us why you feel you would be suitable for this opportunity?" based on your QA testing and SEO experience:

"I believe that my background in manual QA testing and technical SEO makes me an excellent fit for the Personalized Ads Evaluator position with TELUS International. As a QA tester, I have developed a strong attention to detail and an ability to analyze data and identify issues. In SEO, I have honed my skills in data-driven decision-making and have experience optimizing website elements for both search engine visibility and user experience.

As a Personalized Ads Evaluator, I understand the importance of ensuring that ads are relevant, useful, and non-intrusive for users. With my experience in QA testing, I can effectively evaluate the quality of ads and ensure that they meet the desired standards. Moreover, my experience in technical SEO gives me a unique understanding of how ads can impact user experience on a website.

I'm also confident in my ability to work independently and as part of a team. As a QA tester, I often had to work closely with developers and other stakeholders to identify and resolve issues. Similarly, in SEO, I had to collaborate with content creators, designers, developers, and other team members to ensure that SEO best practices were implemented across the website. I'm eager to bring this collaborative mindset and experience to the Personalized Ads Evaluator role.

Overall, I feel that my combination of technical skills, attention to detail, data-driven decision-making, and collaboration experience make me a strong candidate for this opportunity. I'm excited about the prospect of joining TELUS International and contributing to the success of your personalized ads evaluation team."
